keyword: how many calories is in a corn dog
title: How Many Calories in a Corn Dog?
meta_description: Learn how many calories is in a corn dog with a full nutrition breakdown, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Corn Dog?
assumptions: Standard frozen corn dog (beef/pork hot dog in cornmeal batter, deep-fried), about 113 g total weight.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, hot dog type, frying method, and added condiments. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard corn dog contains about 290 calories and 10 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use turkey hot dog instead of beef/pork

faqs.q: How many calories is in a corn dog from a brand like State Fair?
faqs.a: Typically around 290 kcal for a standard 113 g corn dog.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a corn dog?
faqs.a: About 32 g total carbs, including 1 g fiber and 8 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a corn dog high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, one corn dog has roughly 730 mg sodium due to the batter and hot dog.

faqs.q: How does baking a corn dog affect calories?
faqs.a: Baking reduces fat absorption, lowering calories by about 50-60 kcal compared to frying.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in a corn dog?
faqs.a: Approximately 10 g protein, mostly from the hot dog.
